user_query: I'm interested in the latest crypto news. Can you fetch the top 5 articles from CoinDesk and CoinTelegraph? Also, provide me with the top 10 articles from Yahoo Finance. Thanks!

TaskList.description: Fetch the top 5 articles from CoinDesk.
Fetch the top 5 articles from CoinTelegraph.
Fetch the top 10 articles from Yahoo Finance.
